name: Highway to Hellven
description:
Brave paladin and mischievous demon face off against each other in a race. Who will win? 2D platformer, split-screen PVP.


How to play:
- WASD (P1) + Arrow Keys (P2)
- Arrow keys

Particle spawn location depends on your current position in the world.
Wait for the right moment to press the button.

GGJ Game Page
